name: Sky high (Cocidius)
description:
Thank you for taking a look at my test demo for Sky high. Currently this is a early model and concept of the game. Please be sure to report any issues as i will look forward to all feedback.

Sky high is a parkour platforming challenge for the player! you are to slide, jump and grapple your way to end of each level. good luck and have fun.

Known bugs

-There are some issues with hit boxes of platforms around the sides.

-when the player reaches the end screen you are unable to use the mouse to press the quit button (for now pleas just tab out and close the program)

Upcoming features

-New modes

-new sounds

-more levels

-bug fixes
